## ğŸ“‚ Project Structure
- **src/app/** â†’ routes (App Router)

---

## âš¡ Run Locally

1) **Clone & env**
```bash
git clone https://github.com/mejorandro/growpulse-frontend.git
cd growpulse-frontend
cp .env.example .env.local
```

**.env.local example**
```
NEXT_PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8000
NEXT_PUBLIC_BRAND_NAME=GrowPulse
```

2) **Install & start**
```bash
pnpm i && pnpm dev
# or
npm i && npm run dev
```
App: http://localhost:3000

## ğŸ”Œ API Integration
The frontend expects the backend endpoints:
- `GET /api/v1/readings?date=...&profession=...&focus_area=...` â€” list
- `GET /api/v1/readings/{id}` â€” detail
- `POST /api/v1/readings/generate` â€” (dev) create new brief

`src/lib/api.ts` wraps `fetch` with basic error handling.
